pageProduct.name: Simple Kind to Skin Brightening Under Eye Mask 4g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SIMPLE UNDER EYE HYDROGEL MASK BRIGHTEN 4 GR

Time to glow! Inspired by Asian beauty rituals and made in Korea where the sheet mask trend originates, this new Kind to Skin™ Radiance Boosting Sheet Mask is biodegradable and is made of 100% natural cotton, designed to contour the face like a moisturising second skin. The natural cotton face mask, formulated with naturally derived fruit enzymes, leaves skin smooth and glowing. It's skin-brightening, but it's a deeply moisturising face mask too; the Simple® Kind to Skin™ face mask gives skin 20 days' worth of moisturiser* after just one use. For skin that faces the drying effects of daily life, this moisturising mask helps brighten and moisturise. Simple® Kind to Skin™ Radiance Boosting Sheet Mask contains no chemicals that can upset your skin, no alcohol, no added paraben, no mineral oils and only non-animal derived ingredients. How to use: 1. Remove the mask from the sachet and gently unfold. 2. Place the mask evenly over your previously cleansed skin. 3. Leave for 15 minutes and gently peel off mask. Massage to absorb the excess product into your skin or use a cotton pad to remove. No need to rinse! Use once or twice a week for naturally healthy looking skin. 4. Throw the used mask in the bin; do not flush. The environment will be thankful for it. *glycerin concentration versus Simple® Replenishing Rich Moisturiser

Boxed Contents: 4 GR

Size: 4g

KEY FEATURES

• 100% hydrogel hydrating under-eye mask
• Simple® eye mask for dark circles and fine lines
• Instantly brightens for radiant skin
• New format hydrogel eye mask contours to your face
• Contains naturally derived fruit enzymes
• Hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested

Warnings

WARNING: FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Adenosine, Cellulose Gum, Ceratonia Siliqua Gum, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Chlorphenesin, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract, Citrus Nobilis Peel Extract, Dextrin, Disodium EDTA, Glucomannan, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Niacinamide, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Chloride, Xanthan Gum.

Directions

Remove the mask from sachet and gently peel off the backing film. Place mask on previously cleansed under eye area. Repeat on the other side. Leave for 10-15 min and gently peel off the masks. Gently dab to absorb the excess product into your skin. No need to rinse. Use once or twice a week for naturally healthy looking skin.

USAGE ADVICE

Remove the mask from sachet and gently peel off the backing film. Place mask on previously cleansed under eye area. Repeat on the other side. Leave for 10-15 min and gently peel off the masks. Gently dab to absorb the excess product into your skin. No need to rinse. Use once or twice a week for naturally healthy looking skin.

Recyclable Packaging?: No
